website_summaries.verdict: This high quality set holds a self-sharpened edge well, and every knife is labeled for easy use.
pros: Set comes with 13 knives in all (8 of which are steak knives), as well as kitchen shears and a knife block
Built-in ceramic knife sharpeners work well to keep edges sharp
Knives are labeled on the end so you can easily ID them
cons: Reports that some of these arrive with a defective edge or bent tip

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and Broke Off handle!
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for 3-4 months. Then I noticed the main knife started getting rusted and then yesterday it just snapped. Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ely

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are GREAT! They are super sharp. They have a good, balanced weight. The self-sharpening will keep them super sharp. These are the best knives I've ever used. Well worth the price! These knives cut through most food items by simply sliding the blade without applying extra pressure. Whether slicing, dicing or chopping, these knives will get the job done effortlessly! (be careful not to get your own body parts in the way of these blades, or you WILL end up with stitches!)
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: both in construction and weight - even the paring knife has some nice heft to it
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a couple decent knives over the years but this whole set feels solid, both in construction and weight - even the paring knife has some nice heft to it. Having the built-in sharpening feature is simply the topping on the cake. What I thought would be gimmicky was as solidly constructed as everything else and actually worked as advertised! Would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey A. Winkworth

customer_reviews.title: These are hand's down my favorite knives to use in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These are hand's down my favorite knives to use in the kitchen, and much better than any knives I have used before. They are extremely sharp. I absolutely love the built-in sharpener, and the knife block itself is a beautiful dark brown color. I would definitely recommend these knives for anybody looking to get a solid set at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stazzone

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting time forcing your dull ass knife through the sweet peppers and buy this ...
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Stop wasting time forcing your dull ass knife through the sweet peppers and buy this knife set. It stays sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Knives !
customer_reviews.text: Just got my knives today and couldn't wait to wash them and put them to work. I made a chicken salad for dinner and these knives are so sharp that they cut like butter. And the best part is that I will never have to sharpen them ever again because of the built in ceramic sharpener. I am extremely happy with my purchase and I hope they don't let me down several years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are amazing! The in-block sharpener keeps them razor sharp and I do mean razor sharp. They have good weight and balance to them. The block is attractive and also small enough to fit well in a kitchen with little counter space. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a great set of knives that doesn't feel like/can't dish out the money for a set of Wusthof's.
customer_reviews.author: John Barwick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is replacing an Anolon knife set. This has a much smaller footprint and is aesthetically pleasing to the eye. The knives are sharp and well balanced and felt nice in my hand. I like the built in sharpener for the non-serrated knives. I’ve used all the knives and the scissors and they have all performed excellent on the tasks I’ve used them on. I gave it four stars as one of the steak knives had a small gouge in the blade. It was replaced by Calaphon free of charge under the warranty. Calaphon’s customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: C. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made, very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Received these this week, so far I am impressed with the sharpness and heft of the knives. They seem well made. I got them for a very good price during prime week. Can’t wait for my friends who come to visit and while here cook sometimes and always whine about my dull knives 😝
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife set. The knives are sharp, elegant and are great for all kinds of cooking techniques. Greatest thing I bought from amazon and would totally buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balance, heavier handle then expected but fits great ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome balance, heavier handle then expected but fits great and works awesome. Rubber gripped handle doesn't slip. Very sharp. Only have four sharpers in block but works nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives, VERY sharp
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife for her birthday and she absolutely loves them. No issues whatsoever, still very sharp several months later. In fact, they're so sharp that we sliced ourselves accidentally in the first few weeks because we weren't used to knives being this effective. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are quite nice for the price. Very good construction and built in sharpening is just a plus. Be warned, they re VERY SHARP. Ran fine through my dishwasher with no leakage issues.
customer_reviews.author: Landru

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Set
customer_reviews.text: These knives are spectacular! The absolute best knives we have ever owned. The block is beautiful, and the knives are deceivingly sharp. They will cut through your food and your finger (just ask my husband). The weight of the knives is enough to add support and to give your more control when in use. Plus, they look stunning on the countertop!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is the best knife set I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: We are so impressed with this Calphalon set, that we've been finding any excuse to get in the kitchen and use them. All of these knives are evenly balanced and lie comfortably in the hand. They come straight out of the box with a beautiful edge and ready to use. If you hand wash and dry, this set will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Whitt

customer_reviews.title: This knife set is awesome. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is awesome. Well worth the price. So far has lasted us quite a bit and the knives just slice through anything we've tried without any effort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bilgediver

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, nice weight.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I love them. They are super sharp (by far the sharpest kitchen knives I've ever used), have a nice thick heavy handle, and the block is nicer than I expected. Overall they are nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin H Pottie

customer_reviews.title: This is a man's knife set. Weighty and well balanced.
customer_reviews.text: Best knife set ever! The weight is great for men who cook. Well balanced, better than any other knife set iv tested, including other calphalon sets. Truly a man's set. Bummer they leave 1 open slot and want you to purchase the final knife separate tho...

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. Well made. Durable. Worth every penny

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sharp. Hasn’t dulled yet
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made cutlery set. Cuts through everything we’ve put them through without issues. Even frozen foods.

I am so used to using dull knives, that it is awesome to see my paring knife slice tomatoes without any pressure. My only complaint is that I was suppose to get an extra knife with my order as a free gift and I didn't receive it. Otherwise, I would have given the full 5 stars. I feel if they promise you something it needs to be done. There is an empty space awaiting the free gift.

customer_reviews.title: I love my knives
customer_reviews.text: I love my knives! It's amazing how easily I can slice tomatoes and onions so perfectly thin sliced with a good quality sharp knife! The block looks great on my counter. The knives are extremely well crafted, and super sharp. I absolutely love that they sharpen themselves every time I take them out or put them back!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. The only thing I don't like is they come with one empty slot in the block. I know it's for a future purchase or to add a knife you already have. I don't like the block looking like I'm missing a knife and I don't want to put one in it with a different handle. Other than that, these knives are amazing. The self sharpening Slots are only on the larger knives.

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, and a perfect set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop trying to find things to cut. My teenager loves these too. Good weight, and a perfect set for a beginner.

customer_reviews.text: Knives stay sharp, and the gimmic works. Not all knives are in shelf-sharpener ports. Item is an import. Time will tell for duration and quality. So far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return. The santuku knife was not properly ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. The santuku knife was not properly manufactured. Instead of a graceful curve into a straight edge it had an area where it apparently had too much material removed while sharpening, leaving a gap if you placed it edge down on a flat surface. Going to go with Wusthof from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a Significant Upgrade from my Original Calph set that was 10 Years Old.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this set for two months. It is fantastic. Even yesterday my wife complimented on how sharp the knife was at cutting a tomato easily and then showed me. She never compliments anything, so that's speaking volumes on it.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Sisco

customer_reviews.title: There is sharp. Then there’s wow sharp.
customer_reviews.text: So wife had various knives and I wanted her to have a good set. I’ll keep it simple and you decide. She had 2 paper towels on a cutting and cut a completely frozen check breast on top of the paper towels. Picked it up. Both paper towels were sliced like a razor knife sliced them.
customer_reviews.author: VOLTAGExDT

customer_reviews.title: Easily the sharpest kitchen knives I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! The knives glide through EVERYTHING. I don't even apply that much pressure and the knives seem to magically drop through whatever it is I'm cutting up. I had to be really careful because they are so sharp - you really have to pay attention to what you are doing! Superb craftsmanship, perfect balance, really nice weight to them. Best thing I've bought on Amazon all year !
customer_reviews.author: HDelta

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking knife set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase of this knife set. The main knives are high quality with a great weight to them, very sharp right out of the box. The steak knives are definitely not fully forged as they feel a little different but still very nice for stamped steel. The wood block is likewise great quality and looks great on my counter. For a sub- $200 price couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this knife set! Love that the knives are always sharpening as you remove them from the block so it makes prepping food so much easier! So far, the steak knives work just as great for not having the sharpening tool within the block for them. I really hope over time they remain just as sharp.
customer_reviews.author: CAK1124

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchase of the Calphalon knife set
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase of the Calphalon knife set. I purchased this knife set to replace less expensive Cuisinart set that I have had for several years. The Calphalon knives are super sharp and have a nice weight and balance. The block has an attractive finish and looks great in my Kitchen. I am interested to see if the self-sharpening works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Space Saving Self Sharpening Cutlery Set
customer_reviews.text: This set of knives did not disappoint. They are a good quality set. The slim design does take a small amount of space on the counter. I am very happy with this set and would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.

They are used every day and will still shave hair, you have to be cautious because they will snag your finger if you're not.

product_meta.title: Calphalon Precision Self-sharpening 15-piece Knife Block Set, with SharpIn Technology
product_meta.description: Size:15 Piece SetDesigned for optimal edge retention, the Calphalon Precision Self-Sharpening 15-pc. Cutlery Set features SharpIN Technology. Knife blocks have integrated ceramic sharpeners that ensure knives are sharpened every time you pull them out. With Precision Self-Sharpening Cutlery, you can expect exceptional performance with every use. Knives are fully forged from high-carbon, no-stain German steel and feature a full tang for better balance and strength. Bar-riveted handles are conveniently labeled on the end for easy identification in the block. Knife sets include a full selection of knives for every culinary purpose, whether you’re chopping, slicing, mincing or dicing. Beautiful knife block stores all 14 pieces, with an extra non-sharpening slot for your current favorite knife or for adding new cutlery as needed.
feature_bullets: Cutlery set includes 8-in. Chef’s Knife, 8-in. Bread Knife, 6-in. Santoku, 6-in. Utility Knife, 3.5-in. Parer, 8 Steak Knives, Kitchen Shears and a Knife Block; Knife block includes 1 extra non-sharpening slot
Built-in ceramic sharpeners automatically sharpen knives with every use
High carbon, no stain German steel (steak knives made from Asian steel); Fully forged blade, bolster and tang (steak knives made from stamped steel)
Unique bar-riveted handles that are labeled for easy knife identification; Full Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars221 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
